title: Not All Heroes From Earth Are Bad - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Shounen
tags: Angels   Demon Lord   Dense Protagonist   Fairies   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   God-human Relationship   Heroes   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple Transported Individuals   Orcs   Saints   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: 한소
description:
Choi Hyun-seok, a heavyweight champion of the biggest mixed martial arts league on Earth and the one who was called the strongest had died.

Afterwards, he was granted new life as a hero in another world.

‘Wealth! Honor! Endless beauties at your fingertips!’

With thoughts of such a dazzling future, the first thing that he saw when he came to this new world was a towering ox monster.

The monster, who was the commander of the demon army, asked.

“Hero? You’re saying you’re the hero?”

“Uh...I think…?”

And so, that was the start of hell.>
